problems.title: Floyd Warshall
problems.description:
Problem Statement

The problem is to find the shortest distances between every pair of vertices in a given edge-weighted directed Graph.
The Graph is represented as an adjacency matrix, and the value matrix[i][j] denotes the weight of the edge from i to j.
If no edge exists, the value is -1 (except diagonal which is 0).

Return the matrix with shortest distances. If no path exists, keep it as -1.
problems.examples:
Sample Input
2
0 25
-1 0

Sample Output
0 25
-1 0

Explanation:
Shortest distance from 0 to 1 is 25.
